It seems that I solved this problem by inserting numbers in the test 
methods' names, i.e test1Register, test2Unregister, test3LogOut, and 
so on. When I run my junit suite as a regular console program the 
order of test methods is observed, but when I run JUnit suite from 
ant test order is reversed. Any idea how can I force a proper order 
of test method execution while running junit from ant?
Thanks very much for help!
